::Battera::

"I'm a flyer.  I enjoy spending time flying about and being outside." 
She looked at Rex. "I just don't like being kept from being outside 
too long.  I feel....well...kind of trapped when I don't go outside 
every once in a while.  I'll only be out for a little while.  I just 
want to look at the sky for a bit." she said in an ernest and plesent 
voice.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex silently follows Battera, wondering what was wrong with him. He 
was 
> letting a Predacon out of the ship, after she had plenty of time to 
scan, and 
> plant bugs in the bridge and in her quarters. As he follows her, he 
taps his 
> wrist, as screen poping up as his wrist computer activates. Tapping 
a few 
> buttons, he activates a complete scan of the ship, to check for any 
foreign 
> objects.
> 
> Rex walks faster, coming up to Battera. "Is there any reason for 
this walk or 
> do you just like to move about?" he asks her, trying to sound 
friendly.
